about_the_game:
Villaging is a simple game of strategy where you rule a kingdom and you need to manage your resources and your inhabitants. But you will also get threats from other kingdoms so you will need to make an army to fight against them. The game is split into two main features :

The first one is the management of the kingdom :
You will reign over your kingdom to make it prosperous, and to do that, you will have the choice to select the jobs of your new inhabitant. The different jobs
are :
  • farmer
  • black-smith
  • builder
  • artisan
  • merchant
  • soldier
  • woodcutter
  • miner
All of these jobs produce or transform resources, and these resources help to create special buildings that enhance the efficiency of some jobs, upgrade your
castle that gives pretty good boosts, upgrade your troops, or just be automatically used by the builder to build better houses.

The second important feature is the battle :
In the game, you can create an army with ten different types of troops :
  • scout
  • knight
  • mage
  • archer
  • royal guard
  • berserker
  • archmage
  • healer
  • eye of nature
  • archer of the woods
Each one of these troops has a unique skill for fighting. In addition, you will also always own a unique unit, the King which is a unit that can level up with XP
and also stay alive even after falling in a battle

The battles are quite simple, you need to place your troops in the best position and then you can just appreciate the show.
